The I^A and I^B alleles are both dominant toiandcodominantto each other. A woman of blood group O marries a man who has blood group B. G. the son who has B blood type

H. The son with AB blood type

I. The daughter with B blood type

J. The child with a rare blood type not listed

Answer with only a single letter. Answer:<|im_end|>
